game.name: Leaf Blower Co.
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Blow your leaves and your cares away in this chilled out work sim. Build up your business, buy new tools, and unlock upgrades - all while watching the leaves fly. After all, one man’s trash is another man’s cash.
